name: priceFlightOffer
description: Get the final price and booking details for a selected flight offer. This validates the offer and provides accurate pricing including all taxes and fees. Use this after a user selects a flight from search results.

flight_offer.description: The complete flight offer object from search results that the user wants to price. This should include all itinerary, pricing, and traveler information.

id.description: Unique identifier for the flight offer
